DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Japan. This a clinical trial to study the efficacy and safety of three times a day BIAsp-70 compared to two times a day BIAsp-30 in subjects with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Three Times a Day BIAsp-70 Compared to Two Times a Day BIAsp-30 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Subjects with type 2 diabetes Current treatment using intermediateacting, longacting insulin (including longacting insulin analogue) or premixed human insulin for at least 24 weeks HbA1c at least 7.5% and below 10.0% Proliferative retinopathy or maculopathy requiring acute treatment Impaired hepatic and/or renal function Cardiac diseases Uncontrolled hypertension Known hypoglycemia unawareness or recurrent major hypoglycemia
